name: Monsters Attack (itch) (Lord Hypersonic)
description:
Monsters Attack is a third-person shooter game. You will play as a military character Major Rocky who is on a mission to clear the forest from monsters and save all people in that forest who were stuck there.

Controls:-

This game takes input from keyboard and mouse.

FunctionInput KeyMove ForwardWMove LeftAMove BackwardSMove RightDSprintLeft-ShiftJumpSpace-barPick-upEAimRight Mouse ButtonFireLeft Mouse ButtonPauseEscape OR P Pickups:-

There are two types of pickup items:-

  1. Ammo Pickup: It will increase your ammo.
  2. Health pickup: It will increase your health to 50.
Safe House:-

This is where the player will spawn. Monsters cannot enter the safe house.

You can find a massive amount of supply of ammo and health-kit inside a safe house.

Dead Bodies of soldiers:-

Dead bodies of soldiers can be found anywhere in the forest, they were sent before you to rescue the people. 

You can find ammo and health-kit near the dead bodies.

Monsters:-

These are 5 types of monsters in this game. You will face new monsters in every forest which will increase the difficulty of the forest.
